title.narrative: Ushindi - Overcoming Sexual and Gender-Based Violence in Eastern Congo

description.narrative: (Democratic Republic of the Congo): The Ushindi activity addresses sexual and gender-based violence (SGBV) in eastern DRC through a holistic approach to assist survivors of SGBV and engage communities in long-term attitude change. Ushindi covers a population of 1.3 million in 10 health zones to: 1) provide SGBV survivors with quality, age-appropriate medical care, psychological counseling, and legal support; 2) improve communities' response to SGBV in order to facilitate rape survivors' recovery; 3) improve survivors' social integration and economic recovery; and 4) strengthen individuals' and community-based organizations' ability to prevent SGBV.
